Reviews.Content: Awesome Studios with kitchenette I stayed in a studio with a kitchenette at the Waikiki Sand Villa and I loved it (April 2007). It was very cute and cozy and for $160 per night, I thought it was a deal. There is a small pool and clean bar/restaurant area in the lobby. The free breakfast in the morning was mini-doughnuts, toast, coffee, OJ and mini-croissants (something to hold you over until lunch). The hotel is about 2 to 3 blocks from the beach so that was the only thing I didn't like but it was across the street from a grocery store which was very, very convenient! The service was okay; I liked the free Internet access in the computer room (2nd) floor. The computers are new and there were about 10 computers so I never had to wait. I would recommend staying at one of the studios; definitely better than the regular rooms.
Reviews.Author: JengJeng
